table_description: List the content in a repository (list directory, or get file content

columns.name: repository_full_name
columns.description: The full name of the repository (login/repo-name).

columns.name: abbreviated_oid
columns.description: An abbreviated version of the Git object ID.

columns.name: repository_content_path
columns.description: The requested path in repository search.

columns.name: path_raw
columns.description: A Base64-encoded representation of the file's path.

columns.name: size
columns.description: The size of the file (in KB).

columns.name: line_count
columns.description: The number of lines available in the file.

columns.name: content
columns.description: The decoded file content (if the element is a file).

columns.name: is_generated
columns.description: Whether or not this tree entry is generated.

columns.name: is_binary
columns.description: Indicates whether the Blob is binary or text.

columns.name: commit_url
columns.description: Git URL (with SHA) of the file.
